root.name: Panzer Corps
root.description: OverviewPanzer Corps is a Turn-based Strategy game set during World War II. Developed by The Lordz Games studio and published by Slitherine Ltd, Panzer Corps is a homage to SSI's 1994 title, Panzer General.
